name: 安东尼·迪卡洛
name_full: 安东尼·迪卡洛 Anthony DiCarlo
introduction: Anthony DiCarlo is an actor, writer, and producer native to New York City. Anthony was cast in his first feature film The Last Apartment (2015) as Tom, a loving husband turned killer. Shortly after, Anthony shined a light on his comedic side by guest starring in the popular sitcom web series Tracy's Rules (2015). Anthony Stepped out of the box and behind the camera when he took on the challenge of writing, producing and starring in his own film Art Of A Butterfly (2015) as Clyde, a successful yet unstable artist. Anthony solidified industry presence booking a series regular role as Frank Costello, one of the most powerful crime bosses in American Mafia History and nicknamed "The Prime Minister" for his strong political influence, on the AMC miniseries The Making Of The Mob (2015).
